altername_name: 인터랙티브 멀티 게임 체험판 디스크: 버전 30
name: Interactive Multi-Game Demo Disc Version 30
overview: Interactive Multi Game Demo Disc v30 is a demo and video sampler disc, designed for retail store displays of the Nintendo GameCube. The sampler includes a simple menu and playable demos of The Incredible Hulk: Ultimate Destruction, Geist, Donkey Konga 2, Mario Superstar Baseball, Resident Evil 4, and Disney's Chicken Little. The disc also features videos of the following: The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess, Killer 7, Battalion Wars, Geist, Mario Superstar Baseball, Medal of Honor: European Assault, The Incredible Hulk: Ultimate Destruction, Charlie and the Chocolate Factory, Geist, Disney's Chicken Little, Madden NFL 06, Fantastic 4, WWE Day of Reckoning 2, and the Nintendo DS system.
